page.title: 05The Library
page.content: The library is on{Wirksworth { road.}It is open all the week except Sunday ,Tuesday and Thursday.On weekdays it is open from 10.00am. until 7.00pm.but on Saturday closes at 1.00pm. All ages in the village use the library, and it is a quiet place for older students to work in. The librarians are very helpful in obtaining particular books It is estimated by the librarians that about{450 books}are borrowed each week. There are{11,637 books}in Duffield library (including books on loan). Fiction is the most popular type of book.Each book can be borrowed for one month. There are three people employed in Duffield library.
